1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.1: Now Benjamin beget Bale his firstborn, Asbel the second, Ahara the third,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.2: Nohaa the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.3: And the sons of Bale were Addar, and Gera, and Abiud,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.4: And Abisue, and Naamar, and Ahoe,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.5: And Gera, and Sephuphan, and Huram.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.6: These are the sons of Ahod, heads of families that dwelt in Gabaa, who were removed into Mrtnahsth.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.7: And Naaman, and Achia, and Gera he removed them, and beget Oza, and Ahiud.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.8: And Saharim begot in the land of Moab, after he sent away Husim and Bara his wives.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.9: And he beget of Hodes his wife Jobab, and Sebia, and Mesa, and Molchom,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.10: And Jehus and Sechia, and Marma. These were his sons heads of their families.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.11: And Mehusim beget Abitob, and Elphaal.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.12: And the sons of Elphaal were Heber, and Misaam, and Samad: who built One, and Led, and its daughters.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.13: And Baria, and Sama were heads of their kindreds that dwelt in Aialon: these drove away the inhabitants of Geth.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.14: And Ahio, and Sesac, and Jerimoth,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.15: And Zabadia, and Arod, and Heder,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.16: And Michael, and Jespha, and Joha, the sons of Baria.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.17: And Zabadia, and Mosollam, and Hezeci, and Heber,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.18: And Jesamari, and Jezlia, and Jobab, sons of Elphaal,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.19: And Jacim, and Zechri, and Zabdi,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.20: And Elioenai, and Selethai, and Elial,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.21: And Adaia, and Baraia, and Samareth, the sons of Semei.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.22: And Jespham, and Heber, and Eliel,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.23: And Abdon, and Zechri, and Hanan,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.24: And Hanania, and Elam, and Anathothia.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.25: And Jephdaia, and Phanuel the sons of Sesac.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.26: And Samsari, and Sohoria and Otholia,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.27: And Jersia, and Elia, and Zechri, the sons of Jeroham.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.28: These were the chief fathers, and heads of their families who dwelt in Jerusalem.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.29: And at Gabaon dwelt Abigabaon, and the name of his wife was Maacha:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.30: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Sur, and Cia, and Baal, and Nadab,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.31: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher, and Macelloth:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.32: And Macelloth beget Samaa: and they dwelt over against their brethren in Jerusalem with their brethren.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.33: And Ner beget Cia, and Cia beget Saul. And Saul begot Jonathan and Melchisua, and Abinadab, and <u>Esbaal</u>.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.34: And the son of Jonathan was <u>Meribbaal</u>: and Meribbaal begot Micha.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.35: And the sons of Micha were Phithon, and Melech, and Tharaa, and Ahaz.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.36: And Ahaz beget Joada: and Joada beget Alamath, and Azmoth, and Zamri: and Zamri beget Mesa,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.37: And Mesa beget Banaa, whose son was Rapha, of whom was born Elasa, who beget Asel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.38: And Asel had six sons whose names were Ezricam, Bochru, Ismahel, Saria, Obdia, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Asel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.39: And the sons of Esec, his brother, were Ulam the firstborn, and Jehus the second, and Eliphelet the third.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__08.40: And the sons of Ulam were most valiant men, and archers of great strength: and they had many sons and grandsons, even to a hundred and fifty. All these were children of Benjamin.
